content:
Supported Browsers & Devices

Web NFC has specific platform requirements. Support is currently limited to Chrome on Android. Below is a detailed breakdown of compatibility across major platforms and browsers.

PlatformBrowserSupport Status
AndroidChrome (version 89+)✅ Supported
iOS (iPhone/iPad)All Browsers (Safari, Chrome, etc.)❌ Not Supported
WindowsChrome, Edge, Firefox❌ Not Supported
macOSSafari, Chrome, Firefox❌ Not Supported
LinuxChrome, Firefox❌ Not Supported

Key Requirements

  • Secure Context: The Web NFC API is only available on pages served over HTTPS.
  • User Gesture: All NFC operations (reading, writing) must be initiated by a user action, such as a button click.
  • NFC Hardware: The device must have built-in NFC capabilities.
